text: Thanks Dennis, yes I think if statement for tags is the way forward. Apart from one blog type I have which is hugely different in my project - Events - for that I will use a different blog entirely, or I will use HubDB. By the way, can custom fields be added to the blog single post template or do they need to be coded in? So far I can only see how to code them in.
You can use modules in posts, but if you need to extract any of the values for the listing view or elsewhere, you will want to code them directly into the post template
